phrases.phrase: Expiring User Upgrades
Alert user upgrades about to expire
Expiring User Upgrades
Receive expiring and expired subscription emails
Receive expiring and expired user upgrade emails

Receive user upgrade payment reverseal emails

Stop notification emails for all expiring and expired user upgrades

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to receive emails when your subscriptions are about to expire at {board}.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails when your subscriptions are about to expire or disable all emails.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to receive emails when your user upgrades are about to expire or have expired at {board}.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails when your user upgrades are about to expire or have expired or disable all emails.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to receive emails when your user upgrade payments are reversed {board}.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails when youur user upgrade payments are reversed or disable all emails.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to receive emails when you purchase user upgrades at {board}.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails when you purchase user upgrades or disable all emails.
Alert
Both Alert and Email

{username}, your account subscription named {upgrade_title} has now expired.
Thank you for having purchased this upgrade and we hope you have enjoyed the benefits it offered.
You may renew your account upgrades here.

{username}, your account upgrade named {upgrade_title} has now expired.
Thank you for having purchased this upgrade and we hope you have enjoyed the benefits it offered.
You may renew your account upgrades here.

{username}, your account upgrade subscription named {upgrade_title} will automatically renew in {num_days} days.
We hope you have been enjoying the benefits this upgrade offers and thank you in advance for renewing your subscription.
You may view your account upgrades here.

{username}, your account upgrade named {upgrade_title} will expire in {num_days} days.
Thank you for having purchased this upgrade and we hope you have enjoyed the benefits it offered.
You may extend or renew your account upgrades here.

{username}, your payment for extending the account subscription named {upgrade_title} has been reversed.
Therefore the upgrade expiry date has been adjusted accordingly.
You may view your account upgrades here.

{username}, your payment for extending the account upgrade named {upgrade_title} has been reversed.
Therefore the upgrade expiry date has been adjusted accordingly.
You may view your account upgrades here.

{username}, your payment for the account subscription named {upgrade_title} has been reversed.
Therefore the upgrade has been removed.
You may view your account upgrades here.

{username}, your payment for the account upgrade named {upgrade_title} has been reversed.
Therefore the upgrade has been removed.
You may view your account upgrades here.

{username}, thank you for purchasing the account subscription named {upgrade_title}.
We hope you will take advantage of and enjoy all the benefits it has to offer.
You may view your account upgrades here.

{username}, thank you for purchasing the account upgrade named {upgrade_title}.
We hope you will take advantage of and enjoy all the benefits it has to offer.
You may view your account upgrades here.

{boardTitle} Account Upgrade Purchase
Extend
Extend Upgrade
No (Recommended)
Expiration Notification (Days)

Notify users this many days before the upgrade expires (max 30).
To disable notifications, set this value to Zero (0).

An Alert and/or Email will be sent to all users who own this upgrade notifying them that it will expire in X days.
If the upgrade is a recurring one, the notification will be sent out X days prior to the subscription renewal date. While this may help users ensure that they have sufficient funds in their PayPal account prior to renewal, it may also cause them to cancel the subscription.

You may notify users X days prior to their account upgrades expiring.
This value is set when creating or editing a User Upgrade.

Upgrade has no length units

User Upgrade URL
On upgrade/downgrade emails, BCC the email notification if it is sent to an admin email address.

New-line separated list! BCC notification emails on one of the following actions:
purchased_upgrade, payment_reversal, upgrade_payment_reversal, expiring_upgrade, expiring_subscription, expired_upgrade
For debugging purposes, determining why an upgrade failed to be extendable can be tricky. This will print the reason the upgrade couldn't be extended.

Do you wish to provide a "Extend Upgrade" button in the user's purchased upgrades list?
This will allow your members to renew a non-recurring upgrade prior to it expiring. Upgrade length will be added to their remaining time.

This button will only be available if the upgrade details have not changed since it was first purchased (such as cost, length, user groups, and whether recurring) as they must remain the same in case the payment is reversed and the end date has to be adjusted accordingly.

Alert text may be changed by modifying the following phrases:
exup_alert_purchased_user_upgrade
exup_alert_purchased_user_subscription
exup_alert_expired_user_upgrade
exup_alert_expired_user_subscription
exup_alert_expiring_user_upgrade
exup_alert_expiring_user_subscription
exup_alert_payment_reversal_upgrade
exup_alert_payment_reversal_subscription

Email text may be changed by modifying the following phrases:
exup_email_purchased_user_upgrade_body
exup_email_purchased_subscription_body
exup_email_expiring_user_upgrade_body
exup_email_expiring_user_subscription_body
exup_email_expired_user_upgrade_body
exup_email_expired_user_subscription_body
exup_email_payment_reversal_upgrade_body
exup_email_payment_reversal_subscription_body

Conversation title and message can be changed by modifying the following phrases:
exup_conversation_purchased_upgrade_title, exup_conversation_purchased_upgrade_message
exup_conversation_expiring_upgrade_title, exup_conversation_expiring_upgrade_message
exup_conversation_expiring_subscription_title, exup_conversation_expiring_subscription_message
exup_conversation_expired_upgrade_title, exup_conversation_expired_upgrade_message
exup_conversation_expired_subscription_title, exup_conversation_expired_subscription_message
exup_conversation_payment_reversal_upgrade_title, exup_conversation_payment_reversal_upgrade_message
exup_conversation_payment_reversal_subscription_title, exup_conversation_payment_reversal_subscription_message

Let the user know the upgrade has expired. Selecting 'Yes' here will override the default expiry alert
Alert and Email text may be changed by modifying the following phrases:
exup_alert_expired_user_upgrade
exup_email_expired_user_upgrade_text, exup_email_expired_user_upgrade_html

Thank the user for the purchase and provide further information about upgrades and their benefits.
Alert and Email text may be changed by modifying the following phrases:
exup_alert_purchased_user_upgrade
exup_email_purchased_user_upgrade_html, exup_email_purchased_user_upgrade_text

Do you wish to respect the privacy setting Receive site mailings ?
Sellecting 'No' will ensure emails will be sent regardless of whether the user has opted not to receive site mailings.
This link will be shown in alerts, conversations and emails to direct users to the user upgrade page.
Expiring User Upgrades
Notify users when their account upgrades are about to expire.
